T02D2159:254b-1: n'a ga ku la tsa ri stam bha bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2159:254b-3: klu rigs bzhi mnan pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2159:254b-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2159:254b-5: gang zhig dbang du 'dus gyur pas //
T02D2159:254b-6: bskal pa bye ba'i mtha' ru yang //
T02D2159:254b-7: ldang bar mi nus bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2159:254b-8: rdo rje can la gus btud nas //
T02D2159:254b-9: sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir //
T02D2159:254b-10: de yi mnan pa'i cho ga bstan //
T02D2159:254b-11: gser las byas pa'i mchod rten nam / yang na rin chen lnga las byas //
T02D2159:254b-12: khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten brtsig / bum pa khog stong byas pa'i nang //
T02D2159:254b-13: ku la tsa ri'i gzugs byas te //
T02D2159:254b-14: khong stong phyogs bzhir dgod par bya //
T02D2159:254b-15: de 'og phyogs bzhi'i rmang du ni //
T02D2159:254b-16: ku la tsa ri'i bran rnams gzhug / de nas lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2159:254b-17: phreng ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa las //
T02D2159:255a-2: bsgrub bya bkug ste gnyis med bstim //
T02D2159:255a-3: yang na rang lha'i sa bon las //
T02D2159:255a-4: khro bo sna tshogs spros pa yis //
T02D2159:255a-5: bsgrub bya bkug ste snga ma bzhin //
T02D2159:255a-6: mngon sum lta bur khugs par bsam //
T02D2159:255a-7: ku la tsa ri'i spyi steng du //
T02D2159:255a-8: rdo rje rgya gram me ri 'bar //
T02D2159:255a-9: de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni //
T02D2159:255a-10: mi 'khrugs rgyal po g-yon brkyang bzhugs //
T02D2159:255a-11: bskal pa'i mtha' ru mnan par bsam //
T02D2159:255a-12: de nas bdud rtsi ldang bcas pa //
T02D2159:255a-13: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha la dbul //
T02D2159:255a-14: dam la gnas par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2159:255a-15: sbrul dang sbal pa'i sha dang tshil //
T02D2159:255a-16: glang dmar pa dmar la sogs pa'i //
T02D2159:255a-17: khrag la sogs pa rnams kyiis ni //
T02D2159:255a-18: bsgrub bya la ni gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2159:255a-19: dbyar gyi khyim gsum tha ma yi //
T02D2159:255a-20: drug gnyis bzhi yi nyin phyed na //
T02D2159:255a-21: sgrub khang them rtsa'i 'og tu ni //
T02D2159:255a-22: shin tu dam par sba bar bya //
T02D2159:255a-23: phyag na rdo rje khro bo che //
T02D2159:255a-24: rab tu khros pa'i mthu stobs kyis //
T02D2159:255a-25: ri rab klad la bskor nas ni //
T02D2159:255a-26: de 'og ku la tsa ri ni //
T02D2159:255a-27: rigs de rnams ni mnan byas kyis //
T02D2159:255a-28: thar ba yi ni dus med par //
T02D2159:255a-29: dam tshig gnyan gyis ma 'da' cig / nyes pa
T02D2159:255a-30: 'di las ma ldog cig / lus 'di rul cing
T02D2159:255a-31: myags gyur nas // snying ni 'gems shing zags par byed //
T02D2159:255a-32: tshe yi 'du byed byas nas ni ;
T02D2159:255a-33: / mnar med par ni 'gro ba yin //
T02D2159:255a-34: byang chub sems bskyed byams pa'i sems //
T02D2159:255a-35: skyes pa'i tshe na gtang bar bya //
T02D2159:255a-36: phreng ba'i sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2159:255a-37: shin tu khros pas bzlas par bya //
T02D2159:255a-38: mthu stobs drag po'i nga ro yis //
T02D2159:255a-39: stang stabs kyis kyang mnan par bya //
T02D2159:255a-40: ngang tshul bzang zhing shes rab can //
T02D2159:255a-41: bla ma la gus gtong phod pa //
T02D2159:255a-42: gal te rmongs pas gzhan du sbyin //
T02D2159:255a-43: tsha ba chen por yun ring gnas //
T02D2159:255a-44: aom n'i l'am ba ra badzra p'a ni sa ma
T02D2159:255a-45: ya n'a ga ku la tsa ri ai m'am ba
T02D2159:255a-46: li'm kh'a hi kh'a hi sv'a h'a /
T02D2159:255a-47: gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags so //
T02D2159:255a-48: klu rigs bzhi'i mnan pa nam gru'i rigs las byung
